name: Princess Lips Spa Salon - Lips Makeover
name_original: Princess Lips Spa Salon - Lips Makeover
description:
Welcome to the “Lip Spa” Salon. This is a skin care beauty salon for girls and kids.

For all the princesses and kids out there, this is your chance to become a real life princess by taking special care of yourself and by carrying yourself as a princess.

Lip spa is a treatment and makeup salon for the girls and kids to get their lips treated in a professional way. Learn the tips of how to take care of your lips from the lip spa and salon for girls and kids and all you girls dress up like a princess.
